data.comment: Today's referee, Hakim Ben el Hadj, has blown to start the match.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Marseille, close to Lille's area.
In the minute 1, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Marseille.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 4, Lille's Burak Yilmaz has run offside.
Lille needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Lille drive forward but Burak Yilmaz is judged offside.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Zeki Celik for Lille who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Lille at Orange Velodrome.
Zeki Celik has recovered and rejoins the match in Marseille.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 13, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Marseille throw-in in Lille's half.
Burak Yilmaz for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 17, Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 21, Yuto Nagatomo (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Marseille are coming forward and Florian Thauvin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Lille have a goal kick.
Marseille are pushing forward but Dimitri Payet's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Lille at Orange Velodrome.
Lille's Luiz Araujo breaks free at Orange Velodrome. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
In the minute 31, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Lille.
Lille to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 33, Lille drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Marseille throw-in in Lille's half.
In the minute 35, Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Free kick Lille.
Throw-in high up the field for Lille in Marseille.
Hiroki Sakai returns to the field for Marseille after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 37, The match at Orange Velodrome has been interrupted briefly for a check on Hiroki Sakai, who is down injured.
In the minute 38, Burak Yilmaz for Lille is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 40, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Marseille Lille drive forward through Zeki Celik. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 44, In Marseille Lille attack through Luiz Araujo. The finish is off target, however.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Marseille a goal kick.
Goal kick for Lille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Marseille.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Marseille to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
The first half has been concluded at Orange Velodrome.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Lille's Jonathan Bamba misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
Goal! Lille have got their heads in front thanks to a Luiz Araujo strike.
In the minute 47, Great play from Jonathan Bamba to set up the goal.
Burak Yilmaz (Lille) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Marseille a goal kick.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 50, Benjamin Andre (Lille) gets a yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille.
In the minute 51, Lille have a goal kick.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 53, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In the minute 55, Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Marseille throw-in in Lille's half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In the minute 58, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Orange Velodrome, Florian Thauvin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Domagoj Bradaric (Lille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 59, Marseille drive upfield and Morgan Sanson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lille defender.
Dimitri Payet of Marseille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Lille at Orange Velodrome.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Yuto Nagatomo with Bouna Sarr. This is the first substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
In the minute 61, Marseille have a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille's Luiz Araujo gets in a shot on goal at Orange Velodrome. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Jonathan David gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 65, Reinildo Mandava is replacing Domagoj Bradaric for the away team.
Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 66, Marseille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lille.
Luiz Araujo (Lille) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Valere Germain is on a sub for Florian Thauvin for Marseille.
The home team replace Valentin Rongier with Pape Alassane Gueye.
Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a third substitution, with Nemanja Radonjic replacing Dimitri Payet.
In the minute 72, Lille make their second substitution with Jonathan Ikone replacing Luiz Araujo.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Lille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Free kick in a good position for Marseille!
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Marseille make their fifth substitution with Marley Ake replacing Dario Benedetto.
The away team replace Burak Yilmaz with Renato Sanches.
In the minute 78, Tim Weah is replacing Jonathan David for the away team.
Renato Sanches for Lille has been booked by Hakim Ben el Hadj and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Lille.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Marseille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lille's half?
In the minute 84, Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 85, Goal! Valere Germain (Marseille) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Morgan Sanson with an assist there.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Lille to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Lille throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Boubakary Soumare for Lille drives towards goal at Orange Velodrome. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
In the minute 89, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lille's Tim Weah gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Lille.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Lille.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
Hakim Ben el Hadj blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
